rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Mimic of the Quetzal becomes untapped, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Always searching for answers, the shamans have delved into the minds of animals. One has chosen the quetzal, mystified by its innate beauty.[/i]
